algorithm_technique: Iterative calculation: Sum max heights per row (xy projection), max heights per column (yz projection), and non-zero cells (zx projection).
problem_summary_simple: Calculate the total shadow area of 3D cubes projected onto three planes.
problem_summary_technical: Iterate through the grid, summing max values in rows (xy), max values in columns (yz), and counting non-zero cells (zx).
key_insights: The projection onto the xy-plane is the count of non-zero cells.
The projection onto the yz-plane is the sum of the maximum heights in each column.
The projection onto the zx-plane is the sum of the maximum heights in each row.
